 27namespace vsip

 30namespace impl

 32
 33namespace psf_detail
 34{
 35
 36// Return the subdomain of a block/map pair for a subblock.
 37
 38// Variant of subblock_domain that works with blocks instead of views.
 39// This could be used from vsip::subblock_domain.  However, first need
 40// to verify that pushing the view.block() into vsip::subblock_domain
 41// doesn't force it to always be called.
 42
 43template <dimension_type Dim,
 44	  typename       BlockT>
 45inline Domain<Dim>
 46block_subblock_domain(
 47  BlockT const&       block,
 48  Local_map const&    /*map*/,
 49  index_type          sb)
 50{
 51  assert(sb == 0 || sb == no_subblock);
 52  return (sb == 0) ? block_domain<Dim>(block)
 53                   : empty_domain<Dim>();
 54}
 55
 56template <dimension_type Dim,
 57	  typename       BlockT,
 58	  typename       MapT>
 59inline Domain<Dim>
 60block_subblock_domain(
 61  BlockT const&    /*block*/,
 62  MapT const&      map,
 63  index_type       sb)
 64{
 65  return map.template impl_subblock_domain<Dim>(sb);
 66}
 67
 68} // namespace vsip::impl::psf_detail
 69
 70
 71
 72/***********************************************************************
 73  Definitions - Sourcery VSIPL++ extended parallel support functions
 74***********************************************************************/
 75
 76/// Return the domain of BLOCK's subblock SB.
 77
 78/// Requires
 79///   DIM to be dimension of block,
 80///   BLOCK to be a block,
 81///   SB to either be a valid subblock of BLOCK, or the value no_subblock.
 82///
 83/// Returns
 84///   The domain of BLOCK's subblock SB if SB is valid, the empty
 85///   domain if SB == no_subblock.
 86
 87template <dimension_type Dim,
 88	  typename       BlockT>
 89Domain<Dim>
 90block_subblock_domain(
 91  BlockT const& block,
 92  index_type    sb)
 93{
 94  return impl::psf_detail::block_subblock_domain<Dim, BlockT>(
 95    block, block.map(), sb);
 96}
 97
 98
 99
100/// Return the domain of BLOCK's subblock held by the local processor.
101
102/// Requires
103///   BLOCK to be a view
104///
105/// Returns
106///   The domain of BLOCK's subblock held by the local processor.
107
108template <dimension_type Dim,
109	  typename       BlockT>
110Domain<Dim>
111block_subblock_domain(
112  BlockT const& block)
113{
114  return impl::psf_detail::block_subblock_domain<Dim, BlockT>(
115    block, block.map(), block.map().subblock());
116}
117
118} // namespace vsip::impl
119
120} // namespace vsip
121
122#endif // VSIP_IMPL_PAR_SUPPORT_BLOCK_HPP
